properties.address: The Moorlands Community Charity, East Riding of Yorkshire DN14 5UA
properties.description: Our community centre is open to anyone who would like a warm, friendly atmosphere with the opportunity to meet other residents, friends or family. You can have a cuppa or a snack free of charge. Sit and relax, read a newspaper or book from our book library, do a jigsaw from our jigsaw library, or meet new friends. We believe in delivering opportunities that people have asked us to provide, so if there is anything more you would like us to do, please ask. There are trained support staff available to help you with any queries you may have.
properties.title: The Moorlands Welcome Space

properties.description: A warm welcome, join us for a cup of tea and a biscuit! Various activities from a game of cards, dominoes, board games, or just a chat. Access to computers, free wifi, support provided and able to signpost to agencies
properties.title: Warm Welcome

properties.address: Stainforth Community Library, Church Road, Doncaster, England, DN7 5PW, United Kingdom
properties.description: Free Wi-Fi, Device Charging, Advice, People to chat to, Space to work, Food/Drink for sale, Wheelchair Accessible, Toilets, Parking, Child Friendly, Computer Access
properties.title: Stainforth Library
